document_data.name: Sorceller's Encapsulate
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sorceller's Encapsulate''' was the local guild and school comprised those [[spellcaster]]s who lived in the town of [[Daggerford]].
document_data.Activities: The guild regulated the [[magic]] trade within Daggerford. They only allowed spellcasters of a similar level of expertise and knowledge to trade with one another, for the safety of its more novice members.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Sorceller's guildhall was located in Daggerford's [[Caravan Quarter]] near the [[Caravan Gate]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}} The building of the guild was a tall three-story building with it's main hall and entrance located up the stairs on the second floor. The main hall was decorated with a huge majestic circle of magic that glimmer and radiated arcane energy. The city's library was located on the first floor of the guildhall and was accessible via a stairwell from the main hall. The third floor was magically sealed off from anyone who was not the member of Sorceller's Encapsulate and was accessible via a sealed and warded door to the stairwell leading up.
document_data.Members: All types of [[arcane]] and [[divine]] spellcasters were allowed to join the guild.
document_data.Notable Members:
*[[Rylett McGinn]] was a senior [[elf]] wizard of the guild ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
*[[Delfen Yellowknife]]  was a happy-go-lucky member of the guild ''circa'' 1372 DR.
